post.author: zeh
post.body:
Although we don't usually post news about mods here, I thought this was good enough to be featured.

Well, the Recall to Hell team has posted a huge update on their website yesterday, with a lot of new media about this upcoming Doom 3 mod. They've also posted a page with a presentation for their mod, describing locations, weapons, enemies and everything else you'll find on this mod once it's released.

They're also taking part on Mod DB's Mod of the Year Awards. If you think it's worth it, you can see their profile and vote here.

More information and discussion on this thread.

It's really cool to see someone not on the mod team start a topic about it and take interest in telling other people

Thanks for the attention, zeh!!
